issue.title: temu.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.temu.com/ca/mens-classic-straight-leg-jeans--business-casual-100-polyester-denim-with--leather-patch-machine-washable-black-with-stitched-detailing-plus-size-jeans-g-601099925059854.html?thumb_url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.kwcdn.com%2Fproduct%2Ffancy%2F40839d8b-a28d-49f1-9a7e-340f945eca49.jpg%3FimageView2%2F2%2Fw%2F500%2Fq%2F60%2Fformat%2Fwebp&_web_cover=thumb_url&pic_h=1800&pic_w=1350&spec_id=16086&spec_ids=16086%2C3002&from_rec=1&enable_cache=0&sw_stream_reload=1

### Ad Blocking

EasyList, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

https://www.temu.com/ca/api/hugo/hertz/user_event/report

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.alibaba.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alibaba.com/x/AzQCxL?ck=pdp](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alibaba.com%2Fx%2FAzQCxL%3Fck%3Dpdp) ### Comment > Здравствуйте. На мобильной платформе Алибаба не открывается файлы, документы, фото и видео. Мой мобильный оператор лайф, говорит что никаких блокировок через него нет. Отключаю оператора лайф, подключаю оператора скиф, всё открывает. На других ресурсах таких проблем нет, например ютуб или тик-ток. В данный момент происходит в мобильном приложении андроид. В ПК виндовс, таких проблем нет. Username: `@Владимир` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/94jez7xfre4ooc0kg8ogg0wkg4ws0k0hw8juqlood4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/go48vmipu08owowkgkg88gg8sg4w4osmblgqkry9jk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ro3tkr2tjr4w8wswkc8sco4cowoc48cpannbpy6x68.jpg?nc=1)

Screenshot 6 ![Screenshot 6](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6r4he6uikcwssoso8w84gw8w4wg0k4kfeein443eao.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 7 ![Screenshot 7](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/f8zw4z3epds0sw0400osog8ckwc4gco954enktq1u8.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 8 ![Screenshot 8](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qgq1d74qnf48cggw4kc04wok4gwkcsw6btysxdjods.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 9 ![Screenshot 9](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/o2petcien5co0c0o44s4sgkkosg8owontehtnul6ys.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 10 ![Screenshot 10](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6w5m5he5w8cog8gw04g48o48ooc0w8s8riimdedrlk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6vv4s1pql0w8cggos8kckskgk00ooocfhm7paooldk.jpg?nc=1)

**Tracking methods**:

**Miscellaneous**:

Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`

AdGuard Widgets Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | нет
